title: Orianna Main Club
body:
Hey there, i just created an club for Orianna Mains who´d like to join a club for Orianna Mains!
If you want to join it, just add me (IGN: JSisAWESOME) and i´ll invite you!
Have a nice day!

replies.body:
This is the german forum so advertising in english is probably not the best idea ^^
However, I do own an Orianna main club myself (name is "Winter Wonder Orianna" with the tag "Or√¨") so in case you just want some other Orianna mains to talk to, feel free to add me: Askir

Ah sorry, didnt get that :D

Anyways, i added you, cause I liked to talk with other Orianna mains aswell :D.
